name: Robots VS Humans
description:
The game is about a war between the Humans and the Robots the player will have 6 mission to do them, the first mission is in the forest there is some robots you must kill them, the second mission is in a park there is some robots you must kill them, the third mission is also in the forest but the player is a military tank and the player must damage 4 robot cars, the fourth mission is in the desert  there is some robots you must kill them with a sniper, the fifth mission is also in the desert there is some robots you must kill them and the sixth mission is to kill a big robot there will be an army with you to help.

THE ASSETS:

  • The garden , the robots , the forest and the music is from Asset store.
  • The military vehicles, the robot vehicles and the weapons is from Dev-Assets.

DOWENLOAD AND TRY IT
